operation_mode.label: Mode
operation_mode.description: a name defining the operation mode of Cato

dense.label: Format Condensed
dense.description: true: type outputs in a single line; false: type outputs as a table

num_infers.label: Maximum number of Displayed Inferences
num_infers.description: Number of relevant inferences displayed per gesture

cutoff.label: Certainty Cutoff
cutoff.description: Level of certainty below which gesture will not be displayed

gesture.label: Gesture Parameters
gesture.description: Settings for gesture collection and recognition cutoff tools

key.label: Gesture Key
key.description: Human-readable field describing Gesture model's names of gestures
key.note: This determines text output of practice mode

confidence_threshold.label: Confidence threshold
confidence_threshold.description: Threshold of gesture confidence probability [0, 1], for Cato to accept gesture and execute command
confidence_threshold.note: Low value -> few dry-fires, more frequent misinterpretation. High value -> frequent dry-fires, rare misinterpretation

length.label: Length
length.description: Number of samples (max) in a gesture to be fed to Neuton

idle_cutoff.label: Idle Cutoff
idle_cutoff.description: Number of consecutive idle samples leading to gesture cutoff

start_threshold.label: Movement threshold
start_threshold.description: movement required to start capturing gesture. Startup threshold

idle_threshold.label: Idle threshold
idle_threshold.description: Value of move speed below which is considered idle - leading to mouse exit. Low number = more stillness to idle out of gesture recognition

timeout.label: Timeout
timeout.description: Maximum Time (seconds) to Wait for Gesture Start before exiting recognition window

gc_timeout.label: Gesture Collection Timeout
gc_timeout.description: Time to wait before beginning gesture collection over bluetooth
